channel.title: Homes on Daker Pinheiro
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Daker Pinheiro

item.title: about
item.description:
Biography

Daker Pinheiro is a software engineer that loves graphics, real time & high performance systems. His interests include photo realistic rendering, artificial intelligence and image processing. Also an open source enthusiast. Enjoys board gaming, sailing, boxing and the classics.

item.title: experience
item.description:
• 2016: Software Engineer at Intel
  • 2015-2016: Researcher at Voxar Labs
  • 2010-2015: Software Engineer at INDT
